The Dangjiahe Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Zhangcunyi Town, Fuxian County, Yan'an City, Shaanxi Province

operators: 陕西富源煤业有限责任公司

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shaanxi Fuyuan Coal Industry Co., Ltd. and owned by Henan Energy and Chemical Industry Group Co., Ltd.
